testing - package testing
 
testInvalidMoveIntoCheckMoveMessage() - Method in class testing.ChessModelTests
This method checks first that the player cannot make a move if the move puts the player in check and secondly it tests the functionality of the ChessMoveMessage by representing the moves as ChessMoveMessages

This method tests the functionality of the ChessMoveMessage by creating a basic move and testing the moveSet from the move message

This method tests the piece move set functionality specifically for the queen
